item.title: Inflation remains stubbornly high for many Americans. Could it get worse under Trump?
item.description: Consumer prices rose 2.9% in December from a year earlier, marking the third consecutive monthly uptick in annual inflation.

item.title: How do you ensure good luck on Lunar New Year? NPR wants to know
item.description: The Lunar New Year falls on Jan. 29 this year. NPR wants to know what traditions you uphold to ensure good luck in the year to come.

item.title: LA fires are still raging, but forecasters expect calmer winds in the coming days
